about.specialties: Shift is the first used-car dealership that doesn't bring the haggle or the pressure. Whether you are looking to browse vehicles online, or on our lot, we make purchasing your new car fast, easy, and transparent. We offer test-drives and great financing options available for every car along with a rigorous 150-point inspection report and a 5-day return. We are a dealership that is committed to challenging the status quo by always putting our customers first.

history.history_text: Shift was founded in 2014 by former Google and Dropbox team members, launching in San Francisco's Castro District. The mission is to turn what is universally regarded as a burdensome life event into a delightful experience, and to bring trust and simplicity to the peer-to-peer used car market.
